body:
Aurelien, Your data is not recognized as numbers but as text and that's why the chart is not accepting the input. Pass the data through a number component and you'll be set. See image.
[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/CSyxtXH-9chv-BLJAg*SpkG6GlbK-KOQWsfYpBh5fa4Lf2ssXfcWN1Ipmh4gR2Zrw8Hdw7Bj1hcSweyPikrJ3ACKTzaMgO0k/Capture.JPG)
